TEXT.TITLE: COLOMBIA JUNE COFFEE REGISTRATIONS OPENED
TEXT.BODY: Colombia has opened coffee registrations for June shipment with no limit set for private exporters, as in April and May, a National Coffee Growers' Federation official said. Colombia has sold an average of 900,000 bags per month since the beginning of the calendar year. Reuter
